sqlMap.select:
SELECT a.yzb620 as yzb620, a.yzb610 as yzb610, a.yzb621 as yzb621, a.yzb623 as yzb623, a.yzb624 as yzb624, a.yzb625 as yzb625, a.yzb626 as yzb626, a.yzb628 as yzb628, a.yzb62d as yzb62d, a.yzb62a as yzb62a, a.yzb62b as yzb62b, a.yzb62c as yzb62c, a.yzb641 as yzb641, a.yzb62f as yzb62f, a.aae100 as aae100 FROM zb62 a WHERE 1=1
a.yzb620 = #yzb620#
a.yzb610 = #yzb610#
a.yzb621 = #yzb621#
a.yzb623 = #yzb623#
a.yzb624 = #yzb624#
a.yzb625 = #yzb625#
a.yzb626 = #yzb626#
a.yzb628 = #yzb628#
a.yzb62d = #yzb62d#
a.yzb62a = #yzb62a#
a.yzb62b = #yzb62b#
a.yzb62c = #yzb62c#
a.yzb641 = #yzb641#
a.yzb62f = #yzb62f#
a.aae100 = #aae100#
ORDER BY yzb621

SELECT a.yzb620 as yzb620, a.yzb610 as yzb610, a.yzb621 as yzb621, a.yzb623 as yzb623, a.yzb624 as yzb624, a.yzb625 as yzb625, a.yzb626 as yzb626, a.yzb628 as yzb628, a.yzb62d as yzb62d, a.yzb62a as yzb62a, a.yzb62b as yzb62b, a.yzb62c as yzb62c, a.yzb641 as yzb641, a.yzb62f as yzb62f, a.aae100 as aae100 FROM zb62 a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.yzb620 = #yzb620#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO zb62 ( yzb620, yzb610, yzb621, yzb623, yzb624, yzb625, yzb626, yzb628, yzb62d, yzb62a, yzb62b, yzb62c, yzb641, yzb62f, aae100) VALUES ( #yzb620:DOUBLE#, #yzb610:DOUBLE#, #yzb621:INTEGER#, #yzb623:VARCHAR#, #yzb624:VARCHAR#, #yzb625:VARCHAR#, #yzb626:VARCHAR#, #yzb628:VARCHAR#, #yzb62d:VARCHAR#, #yzb62a:VARCHAR#, #yzb62b:VARCHAR#, #yzb62c:VARCHAR#, #yzb641:VARCHAR#, #yzb62f:VARCHAR#, #aae100:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE zb62 SET yzb610 = #yzb610:DOUBLE#, yzb621 = #yzb621:INTEGER#, yzb623 = #yzb623:VARCHAR#, yzb624 = #yzb624:VARCHAR#, yzb625 = #yzb625:VARCHAR#, yzb626 = #yzb626:VARCHAR#, yzb628 = #yzb628:VARCHAR#, yzb62d = #yzb62d:VARCHAR#, yzb62a = #yzb62a:VARCHAR#, yzb62b = #yzb62b:VARCHAR#, yzb62c = #yzb62c:VARCHAR#, yzb641 = #yzb641:VARCHAR#, yzb62f = #yzb62f:VARCHAR#, aae100 = #aae100:VARCHAR# WHERE 1 = 1 AND yzb620 = #yzb620#

yzb610 = #yzb610:DOUBLE#

yzb623 = #yzb623:VARCHAR#

WHERE 1 = 1 AND yzb620 = #yzb620#

UPDATE zb62
yzb610 = #yzb610:DOUBLE#
yzb621 = #yzb621:INTEGER#
yzb623 = #yzb623:VARCHAR#
yzb624 = #yzb624:VARCHAR#
yzb625 = #yzb625:VARCHAR#
yzb626 = #yzb626:VARCHAR#
yzb628 = #yzb628:VARCHAR#
yzb62d = #yzb62d:VARCHAR#
yzb62a = #yzb62a:VARCHAR#
yzb62b = #yzb62b:VARCHAR#

WHERE 1 = 1 AND yzb620 = #yzb620#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM zb62 WHERE 1 = 1 AND yzb620 = #yzb620#
sqlMap.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(yzb621), 0) + 1 AS yzb621 FROM zb62 WHERE yzb610 = #yzb610:DOUBLE#
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(yzb621), 0) + 1 AS yzb621 FROM zb62 WHERE yzb610 = #yzb610:DOUBLE#
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(yzb621), 0) + 1 AS yzb621 FROM zb62 WHERE yzb610 = #yzb610#
SELECT NVL(MAX(yzb621), 0) + 1 AS yzb621 FROM zb62 WHERE yzb610 = #yzb610:DOUBLE#

SELECT a.column_name AS yzb623, DECODE(a.data_type, 'NUMBER', '2', 'DATE', '3', '1') AS yzb626, CASE WHEN b.comments is null THEN (select z.comments from user_col_comments z where z.column_name = a.column_name and z.comments is not null and rownum = 1) ELSE b.comments END as yzb625, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM aa10a1 WHERE aaa100 = a.column_name), 0, '', a.column_name) AS yzb628 FROM user_tab_columns a, user_col_comments b WHERE a.table_name = b.table_name AND a.column_name = b.column_name AND a.table_name = #yzb613# AND (a.data_type = 'NUMBER' OR a.data_type = 'VARCHAR2' OR a.data_type = 'VARCHAR' OR a.data_type = 'DATE') ORDER BY a.column_id

SELECT a.COLUMN_NAME AS yzb623, CASE WHEN a.DATA_TYPE IN ('VARCHAR','CHAR','BLOB') THEN '1' WHEN a.DATA_TYPE IN ('INT','INTEGER','FLOAT','DOUBLE','DECIMAL') THEN '2' WHEN a.DATA_TYPE IN ('DATE','TIME','DATETIME','TIMESTAMP') THEN '3' ELSE '1' END AS yzb626, a.COLUMN_COMMENT AS yzb625, if((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM aa10a1 WHERE aaa100 = a.column_name)=0, '', a.column_name) as yzb628 FROM information_schema.COLUMNS a WHERE table_name = #yzb613#

SELECT col_description(a.attrelid,a.attnum) as yzb625, CASE WHEN pg_type.typname IN ('varchar','character','varing','char','text') THEN '1' WHEN pg_type.typname IN ('smallint','integer','bigint','decimal','numeric','real','double precision','smallserial','serial','bigserial') THEN '2' WHEN pg_type.typname IN ('DATE','TIME','DATETIME','TIMESTAMP') THEN '3' ELSE '1' END AS yzb626, a.attname as yzb623, case when (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM aa10a1 WHERE aaa100 = a.attname)=0 then '' else a.attname end as yzb628 FROM pg_class as c, pg_attribute as a inner join pg_type on pg_type.oid = a.atttypid where c.relname = lower(#yzb613#) and a.attrelid = c.oid and a.attnum > 0

SELECT a.column_name AS yzb623, DECODE(a.data_type, 'NUMBER', '2', 'DATE', '3', '1') AS yzb626, CASE WHEN b.comments is null THEN (select z.comments from user_col_comments z where z.column_name = a.column_name and z.comments is not null and rownum = 1) ELSE b.comments END as yzb625, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM aa10a1 WHERE aaa100 = a.column_name), 0, '', a.column_name) AS yzb628 FROM user_tab_columns a, user_col_comments b WHERE a.table_name = b.table_name AND a.column_name = b.column_name AND a.table_name = #yzb613# AND (a.data_type = 'NUMBER' OR a.data_type = 'VARCHAR2' OR a.data_type = 'VARCHAR' OR a.data_type = 'DATE') ORDER BY a.column_id

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM zb62 WHERE yzb621 = #yzb621# AND yzb610 = #yzb610#
yzb620 <> #yzb620#
